title: Cabela's Dangerous Hunts 2013
description: The Games on Demand version supports English, French, Italian, German.  Download the manual for this game by locating the game on http://marketplace.xbox.com and selecting “See Game Manual".  In Cabela's Dangerous Hunts 2013 you get Deadlier Predators, Deadlier Hunts:  Smarter and Deadlier Predators: - The new Prowler animal AI engine simulates pack social hierarchies, coordinates complex group tactics and takes advantage of the surroundings to set up deadly ambushes.  New Maneater Co-op Mode: - Two players can join together to take on wave after wave of increasingly deadly beasts in the all-new split screen Maneater mode.  Master Your Fear: - Armed with the new Top Shot Fearmaster controller, control your heart rate to increase your accuracy, deal more damage, or slow down time to line up the perfect kill shot.  Can you hold your own against the most vicious beasts the animal kingdom has to offer?  Find out in Cabela’s Dangerous Hunts 2013!

childDownloads.title: Maneater - Dark Forest
childDownloads.description: Didn't get enough co-op hunting action?  Dark Forest is an all-new Maneater level set in a spooky North American forest, where you’ll face down mountain lions, wolves, and massive grizzlies.  Join forces with a friend to take on even more waves of increasingly deadly beasts!

childDownloads.title: Maneater - Stranded
childDownloads.description: Didn’t get enough co-op hunting action?  Stranded is an all-new Maneater level set in a large African oasis, where you’ll face huge waves of baboons and other terrifying African predators.  Join forces with a friend and take advantage of the high ground to survive!

childDownloads.title: Maneater - The Den
childDownloads.description: Didn't get enough co-op hunting action? The Den is an all-new Maneater level that puts you right in the middle of a den of ferocious hyenas, lions, and more.  Join forces with a friend and see if you have what it takes to survive!
